string-array.name: perguntas
string-array.item: Which of the following statements about the Java language is true?
What is the access modifier that allows a class to be accessed only within the same package?
What is the main method that must be defined in every Java application to start execution?

string-array.name: opcao0
string-array.item: A) Java is a compiled language that cannot be run on different platforms.
B) Java is a programming language that uses the Java Virtual Machine (JVM) to execute bytecode.
C) Java does not support object-oriented programming.
D) Java was developed by Microsoft.

string-array.name: perguntas_php
string-array.item: What is the correct way to start a PHP code block?
Which of the following options is used to declare a variable in PHP?
How can you include the content of one PHP file into another PHP file?

string-array.name: perguntas_c
string-array.item: Which of the following is the correct syntax to print a message in C?
What is the keyword used in C to define a constant value?
Which data type is used to store a single character in C?
